H0.text: Blackcap, Whitethroat and Chiffchaff belong to what family of bird. Sparrow

H1.text: Blackcap, Whitethroat and Chiffchaff belong to what family of bird. Finch

H2.text: Blackcap, Whitethroat and Chiffchaff belong to what family of bird. Thrush

H3.text: Blackcap, Whitethroat and Chiffchaff belong to what family of bird. WARBLER

A4.text: Sylviidae is a family of passerine birds that includes the typical warblers Sylvia, and the closely related genus Curruca, formerly included in Sylvia.
